data.name: ProgressNEXT 2020
data.description: Join us in Boston, June 2020, to learn, connect with leaders and visionaries and thrive in a digital world. ProgressNEXT is the premier event for modern application development.

relatedRecords.name: Global Azure 2020 - Washington DC
relatedRecords.description:
The Global Azure event is a free one-day mini-conference, taking place on April 23-25 2020 in venues across the world, driven by Microsoft Azure experts and community enthusiasts.
The Washington DC edition will take place on April 25th in the Arlington Tech eXchange (ATX)

relatedRecords.name: O’Reilly Software Architecture Conference
relatedRecords.description: Go deeper and broader on crucial topics such as microservices, serverless, leadership, and domain-driven design. Get the training you need to stay at the forefront of software architecture.
